name: Red's Kingdom
description: Help lead Red on a journey across the land in search of his missing nuts, overcoming obstacles and unlocking abilities in this charmingly epic isometric puzzle adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL v3.1+ compatible. NVIDIA, AMD or Intel HD with latest drivers. Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL v3.1+ compatible. NVIDIA, AMD or Intel HD with latest drivers. Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card.
